column1: APR: DMT2, dyslipidemia, high blood pressure, ex-heavy smoker.
widespread parenchymal thickening in the middle and lower third of the left hemithorax; further, more nuanced parenchymal thickening in the right basal site.

evidence of multiple frosted glass thickening areas, prevalent in the lower lobes and in the posterior seat, with iteress of the intralobular interstitium, findings compatible with acute phlogistic framework.
